ygData.subject: Re: [neat] Re: NEAT-python
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Stefan! ... I thought it was enabled, sorry for that. The Issue tracker is available now. ... I m not adding new functionalities to version 1.0, everything

Hi Stefan!

> How about enabling the issue tracker on the project page and getting
> some of these tasks/bugs in there? I'm sure there are others like me
> who would be interested in contributing.

I thought it was enabled, sorry for that. The Issue tracker is available now.

> I'd also be interested in being able to check out the latest code,
> even if it still requires some cleaning up, as while it would be great
> to be able to download a 1.0 release at the end of the year, that's
> still some time away and time is a little short :)

I'm not adding new functionalities to version 1.0, everything is
basically there already. But I hope to get the C/C++ extensions done,
as well as the DPNV experiment. What I meant "by the end of the year"
was to include documentation, FAQs and all that. I can promise you the
code, but not the docs :)

Stay with the Python neural network module meanwhile.

Cesar
